auth.Password must have at least <num> charac: Password must have at least 6 characters
auth.There was a problem with your sign up: There was a problem with your sign up
auth.There was a problem with your sign in: There was a problem with your sign in
auth.Enter your email and we'll send you a li: Enter your email and we'll send you a link to reset your password
auth.We have sent you an email with a passwor: We have sent you an email with a password reset link.  Check your email for the link.
auth.There was a problem sending you the pass: There was a problem sending you the password reset link
auth.There was a problem resetting your passw: There was a problem resetting your password
auth.The password reset link in your email ha: The password reset link in your email has expired.  You can try again to get a new link.

cart.This product is in your cart: This product is in your cart

user.Password must have at least <num> charac: Password must have at least 6 characters
user.There was a problem with updating your p: There was a problem with updating your profile

We need to verify your account.
verification.We have sent an email with a verificatio: We have sent an email with a verification link to
verification.Update email and send a new verification: Update email and send a new verification link to
verification.Are you sure you want to change your ema: Are you sure you want to change your email address?
verification.Your account sign in email will be updat: Your account sign in email will be updated
verification.We will send you a new link to verify yo: We will send you a new link to verify your account
verification.We need to verify your account. You shou: We need to verify your account. You should receive an email with a verification link.
Your account could not be verified.
verification.The link in your email is valid for 24 h: The link in your email is valid for 24 hours after we send it to you.  If it has been longer than 24 hours, you can request a new email.
verification.Verification mail re-sent. Check your em: Verification mail re-sent. Check your email for the new link.
verification.Thanks for verifying your account. What': Thanks for verifying your account. What's next?

sectionLinkDescriptions.home: The {{tenantName}} home screen. Your users will land here when they use {{appName}}.
sectionLinkDescriptions.admin: Your admin area. Manage your plan, schedules, lessons, settings and more.
sectionLinkDescriptions.brand: Your brand admin screen. Manage your company name and logo. Show your identity!
sectionLinkDescriptions.team: Your {{tenantName}} team admin screen. Invite team members to use {{appName}} with you.
sectionLinkDescriptions.clients: Your clients admin screen. Invite clients to use {{appName}} with you.

brand.Name: Name
brand.Are you sure you want to remove this log: Are you sure you want to remove this logo?
brand.Are you sure you want to update your det: Are you sure you want to update your details?

users.At least one email address is required: At least one email address is required
users.If you have more than one email address: If you have more than one email address to add, separate the addresses with a comma.
users.Are you sure you want to re-send this in: Are you sure you want to re-send this invitation?
users.Are you sure you want to revoke this inv: Are you sure you want to revoke this invitation? The invitee will no longer be able to sign up using this invitation.
users.There was a problem updating this user: There was a problem updating this user
users.There was a problem activating this user: There was a problem activating this user
users.There was a problem deactivating this us: There was a problem deactivating this user
users.Are you sure you want to update this use: Are you sure you want to update this user?
users.The user will no longer be able to sign: The user will no longer be able to sign in on {{appName}}
users.The user will be able to sign in on {{ap: The user will be able to sign in on {{appName}}
users.The user will remain in your list, in ca: The user will remain in your list, in case you want to reactivate them in the future

team.Add email addresses and send invitations: Add email addresses and send invitations to your team members to sign up and start using {{appName}} with you.
team.You cannot modify your own permissions: You cannot modify your own permissions
team.The user will consume one allowed active: The user will consume one allowed active team member on your {{appName}} plan
team.You will gain back one allowed active te: You will gain back one allowed active team member on your {{appName}} plan
team.The user will no longer be able access t: The user will no longer be able access the admin area
team.The user will be able access the admin a: The user will be able access the admin area and perform all admin actions

client.Add email addresses and send invitations: Add email addresses and send invitations to your clients to sign up and start using {{appName}} with you.
client.The user will consume one allowed active: The user will consume one allowed active client user on your {{appName}} plan
client.You will gain back one allowed active cl: You will gain back one allowed active client user on your {{appName}} plan

plan.We cannot complete this action now, beca: We cannot complete this action now, because it would exceed the limits of your plan.
plan.To subscribe to this plan, you cannot ex: To subscribe to this plan, you cannot exceed any of the user limits shown here
plan.Your current user counts (highlighted co: Your current user counts (highlighted counts exceed the plan's limits)
plan.If this action were completed, your user: If this action were completed, your user counts would look like this (highlighted counts would exceed the plan's limits)
plan.Deactivate some existing active users (c: Deactivate some existing active users (clients or team members)
plan.Revoke some existing invitations (client: Revoke some existing invitations (clients or team members)

conditions.The selected plan will be applied immedi: The selected plan will be applied immediately
conditions.Your regular billing cycle dates will re: Your regular billing cycle dates will remain the same
conditions.We will continue to use your existing pa: We will continue to use your existing payment method for billing
conditions.You will be billed now at the prorated c: You will be billed now at the prorated cost of the upgrade for the remaining time in this billing cycle
conditions.Since you have already paid for your cur: Since you have already paid for your current plan this cycle, this amount will be deducted from the upgrade cost
conditions.You will be billed the full cost of the: You will be billed the full cost of the selected plan at the start of your next billing cycle, and each cycle thereafter
conditions.You will receive a prorated credit balan: You will receive a prorated credit balance for the remaining time in this billing cycle
conditions.The credit balance will be applied autom: The credit balance will be applied automatically to your next billing cycle
conditions.You will be billed the regular cost of t: You will be billed the regular cost of the selected plan each cycle thereafter
conditions.Because you are moving to a free plan, t: Because you are moving to a free plan, this will be treated as a cancellation of your paid plan
conditions.We are unable to grant refunds or credit: We are unable to grant refunds or credits for any unused portion of your current billing cycle

errors.Tenant not within plan allowances: The selected plan is not eligible based on your current users.
errors.Select a plan with more users allowed: Select a plan with more users allowed
errors.Deactivate users or revoke invitations t: Deactivate users or revoke invitations to bring your usage within the plan allowance

plan.Pick the plan that works best for you. A: Pick the plan that works best for you. All paid plans come with a free trial. Change your plan or cancel at any time.
plan.You are not currently eligible for this: You are not currently eligible for this plan
plan.You will be billed now, then once per mo: You will be billed now, then once per month
